summary:
Experience:
Management: give lead to several teams (12 years)
Coordinating: working together with several departments(logistics/field service) to 
achieve highest efficiency.
Mediator: bringing people together to work out differences and find solutions.
Analyst: analyzing data and situations. 
Change management: working together with others to improve processes.
Risk management: calculate and predict risks involved to create a good strategy to achieve goals set.
Communications: communicating with stakeholders, customers, third parties, field service engineers and managers.
Teaching/Mentoring new joiners at most departments i worked for and the GF Manila Team.
Branches:
•	Retail (8 years)
•	Customer Service/Service Delivery (10 years)
•	IT (11 years)
•	Oil (6+years)
•      Engineering (3 years)


Career Objective: 
To find a challenging job within an interesting company, which can bring out the best in me and make me grow. Taking full advantage of my knowledge, education, skills, network and drive. I am at my best when I am able to steer, guide, advise, support or coach others to reach a higher level.

Specialties: coordinating, planning, building bridges, mediating, coaching,  communication, organizing, analyzing and teaching.

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

awards.title: Recognition of On-site Support Services (July-December 2015)
awards.description: For my contribution to the Site Host Team providing Outstanding On-site  Support Services for Shell at their headquarters

projects.title: Lan Reduction Project Shell
projects.description: Lan Reduction Project within Shell, as an employee of HP made inventory of the lan cable situation. Working together with Shell and AT&T to reduce the number of lan connections.

projects.title: GF Global RPT Team
projects.description: Assisting, advising and Coaching of newly set-up process teams in Manila for access related tasks(creating account, shared folders, distribution lists). I am still an advisor for all the Requestmanagement and JML Teams with HP Manila.

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Change Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Planning: to be as efficient as possible with the usage of the means available to service the customers within the agreed upon terms. You can divide it two kind of planning
I:Ad-hoc planning: register incident, which needs to be planned and fixed according to agreed upon terms.
II: Maintenance Planning: plan the visits to do maintenance at the customer’s sites

Customer Management: maintain and built customer relationships to ensure excellent customer satisfaction and loyalty.                                                                                                                              First Point of Contact: register incident/questions/suggestions and maintain records of your customers
Organize: Work together with other coordinators and other departments to make the most efficient planning.
Coach/Teach: in charge instructing, advising, coaching and explaining all the processes within our department to new joiner or explain tools and processes to other departments.
Engineer: send out, control, instruct and coach the Field Service Engineers to use them to their full potential, as efficient and effective as possible.
Customer: communicate with customers, make appointments, listen to their issues and suggestions, advise and explain the contracts when necessary.     
Stock management: manage inventory and stock
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Planning: to be as efficient as possible with the usage of the means available to service the customers within the agreed upon terms. 

Advising which program would be the best to do their planning in.
Organise: Work together with other departments to make the most efficient planning possible.
Coach/Teach: in charge instructing, advising, coaching and explaining all the processes within our department.
Healthcare workers: send out, control, instruct and coach the personnel to use them to their full potential, as efficient and effective as possible.
Waste Management : Making sure that all waste is processed on the right way, of course also taking in consideration the costs made by this process.
Couriers : Making sure that all couriers are ordered on the right time and if possible combined to make everything more efficient and less expensive.
profile_positions.title: Planner / Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Planning: to be as efficient as possible with the usage of the means available to service the customers within the agreed upon terms. You can divide it two kind of planning
I:Ad-hoc planning: handling incidents and fix the issues as agreed upon terms.
II: Maintenance Planning: As Senior Service Planner I was also working close with the head Maintenance Scheduling.
Registration: registration of the incidents in our planningstool - Syntess Atrium
Test certificates: creating test certificates
Organise: Work together with other coordinators to make the most efficient planning.
Coach/Teach: in charge instructing, advising, coaching and explaining all the processes within our department.
Engineer: send out, control, instruct and coach the Engineers to use them to their full potential, as efficient and effective as possible.
Customer: communicate with customers, make appointments, listen to their issues and suggestions, advise and explain the contracts when necessary.
Ordering: parts and tools for our engineers
Analyse: performance, looking for trends and notice obstacles or opportunities within Plan Process.
This Job was abruptly stopped due to Corona.

profile_positions.title: Service Planner

profile_positions.description:
Taken over by Getronics Global Services to be first point of contact for Shell Employees: advise, guide and assist them with all IT related questions.
 Request management for Global Functions Netherlands: handling the requests made by Shell employees and order when necessary. Also check the requests, if they are conform Shell Policies, if not, inform employee why.
 Stock management for Global Functions Netherlands: place orders, maintain stock levels and 
anticipating demand for items available for Shell employees.
Trainer/Coach: new joiners, helping them to reach their full potential.
 Soundboard: advising/assisting/explaining all kind other parties within Shell like IT Demand Manager, Business Infrastructure Management, Access Management.
profile_positions.title: Focal Point Global Functions/Downstream/Global Solutions/Upstream - Trainer/Coach - at Shell
